text: The Warrens of Virginia is a 1915 American Civil War drama movie directed by Cecil B. DeMille and is the first version of the 1907 play of the same name by William C. de Mille. It stars Blanche Sweet, James Neill, House Peters, Dick La Reno, Mildred Harris, Raymond Hatton, Mabel Van Buren and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1915 drama movies Category:1910s war movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Cecil B. DeMille Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Warrens of Virginia (1915 movie)
